title: Adriana Lima poses in her bra in sexy Instagram selfie | Daily Mail ... - Daily Mail
text: comments She is in amazing shape for a mother-of-two. And Adriana Lima proudly showed off her physique on Thursday night as she posed for a sultry selfie inside her walk-in closet. 'KISS MY ABS UNICORN POWER' The 35-year-old model captioned the snap of her standing in a black bra and leggings. 'Kiss my abs!' Adriana Lima proudly showed off her toned tummy in a sexy selfie she shared on Thursday night Adriana rolled down the top of her pants to reveal some skimpy briefs. She wore her just black locks loose and flipped over to one side. On Tuesday the Brazilian born beauty was all glammed up for a luxury watch event   The statuesque stunner wore a silky nude gown as she posed up a storm on the red carpet. Dazzling: The Victoria's Secret beauty stunned in a silky nude gown for a luxury watch event in Geneva on Tuesday Dazzle like Adriana in a Cushnie et Ochs dress Â£1734.16
